name: Young White Dragon
movement: 40 ft. walking, burrow 20 ft., flying 80 ft., swimming 40 ft.
description: The Young White Dragon features frosty white scales that camouflage it in icy environments, displaying powerful bite and claw attacks.
memorable: It possesses a freezing breath weapon that can encase enemies in ice and is immune to cold damage.
goals: Its driving instincts focus on survival, hoarding treasure, and dominating its frozen territory.
relations: Typically solitary, it can be encountered in cold climates or alongside other dragons.
strengths: Noteworthy abilities include high resilience due to cold immunity and exceptional movement options in icy terrain.
weaknesses: Its low Intelligence may leave it vulnerable to more strategically minded opponents.
attacks: Performs multiattacks with a mix of biting and slashing with claws, dealing significant cold damage.
most_powerful_ability: Cold Breath attack that deals area damage and can severely impact multiple foes.
senses: Has blindsight at 30 feet, allowing it to detect creatures in darkness.
skills: Proficient in perception with a +6 modifier, showcasing its keen senses.
additional_information: Can move effortlessly across icy surfaces due to Ice Walk ability.
Generates a numbing chill that can hinder nearby creatures' movement.
Innate spellcasting abilities to cast animal friendship and sleet storm.
Displays strong physical power with a high Strength score.
Brutal instincts make it a dangerous predator.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting allows it to cast certain spells without material components.
test_queries: cold-breath dragon that loves icy locations
young dragon with freezing power and ice walk
brutal predator known for cold attacks
savage dragon that can navigate through snow effortlessly
